700863f-a.text:
Dewey Ave., north side, east from Edison to Logan Aves., showing
Public School No. 72.
1932.
Board of Education of the City of New York.
700863f-a.folder: Dewey Avenue & Edison Avenue, Bronx, NY

700864f.text:
Dewey Ave. (not seen), north side, east from Edison to Logan Aves., showing the playground and rear of Public School No. 72 as viewed southward along Edison Ave.
1932.
Board of Education, City of New York.
700864f.folder: Dewey Avenue & Edison Avenue, Bronx, NY

700865f-a.text:
Dewey Ave. (school and church facing thereon), east from Edison to Loga: Aves. On the north side of the street is Public School No. 72, and on the smuth side is the Fort Schuyler Presbyterian Community Church. Running from right to left, in front of the church, is East 177th street. The view is northeastward from East Treront Ave.
May 19, 1938.
P. 1  L. Sperr.
700865f-a.folder: Dewey Avenue & Edison Avenue, Bronx, NY

700999f-a.text:
Edison Avenue, north from Dewey to Schley Avenues. In the background, and partially obstructing the course of the avenue,
is the J. D. Wolfe Mansion.
About 1923
Joseph P. Day
700999f-a.folder: Edison Avenue & Dewey Avenue, Bronx, NY
